definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_issneaking"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon area_effect_cloud ~ ~ ~ {Particle:"note",ReapplicationDelay:0,Radius:0.3f,RadiusPerTick:0.2f,Duration:80,WaitTime:20}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Faro</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">spreadplayers ~ ~ 1 16 false @e[type=spruniki:faro]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
